content.rendered:
For a long time, we’ve been working on the launch of Talkmobile but you may be asking yourself, ‘What is Talkmobile?’. Allow us to cover that for you. From their amazing mobile phone deals to the perks alongside their offers, we’re sure you’ll love this network. Once you get to know what they’re all about, you’ll be dying to get involved with them.

 

What is Talkmobile?

Talkmobile is actually an offcut of Vodafone. As one of the largest networks in the UK, Vodafone have a number of different brands, Talk mobile being one of the more successful ones. Through Talkmobile, you’re able to get a whole range of cheaper mobile phone contracts with great data offers too. They even have permission to use Vodafone’s network so you’ll be able to enjoy great coverage and even better network speeds. You can trust that Talkmobile is going to give one of the best services around.

When it comes to answering the question, ‘what is Talkmobile?’, the easiest answer is they’re a network that offers cheap deals on all your favourite modern tech. You won’t find the latest flagship handsets on their network as they just can’t offer super low prices on these. To avoid disappointment, they choose not to offer those deals. Instead, they provide deals on last year’s handsets, and older, that you just can’t ignore. By offering realistic upfront costs, you can also reduce your monthly costs considerably. Talkmobile is perfect if you want to stick to a budget.

Another key characteristic of Talkmobile is the unlimited options on all their deals. With every single plan across all the smartphones on their network, you can enjoy unlimited texts and minutes. This means you can keep in contact with the ones you love at no extra cost. A lot of networks only offer unlimited texts and minutes with a higher price. Talkmobile knows that keeping in touch is important so you can enjoy this perk FOR FREE. With the amazing network coverage too, you’ll be able to stay connected wherever you are.

 

What do they offer?

As one of their main focuses is to keep things simple and easy, the Talkmobile online account is one of the easiest things to grasp. As soon as you’ve placed your order through Fonehouse and have your credit decision, you’ll be invited to create your own Talkmobile account. Through this, you’ll be able to see all the information regarding your mobile phone contract, see your monthly bills and even change your spend cap. There’s nothing you can’t do through this online account!

With times moving on, travelling is more common than ever before. For that reason, networks are needing to change with the times. Talkmobile is one network that has already changed. With this network and any of their plans, you’re able to enjoy your monthly allowance in 41 places across Europe. This means that during your yearly holiday, you’ll be able to stay in touch with your loved ones. Especially with the current situation, you’ll want to let them know you’re safe and healthy.

Everyone has applied for something that requires a credit check at some point in their life. Whether that’s a mobile phone contract or even a mortgage, it comes with a little bit of stress and lots of worry. When you have to wait for your answer, that’s all that seems to be on your mind. To completely get rid of that unnecessary stress, Talkmobile will give you their credit decision as soon as you confirm the order. That means that you can go about your day with no worry and know that your new mobile phone will be on the way shortly.

 

Reasons to join Talkmobile

There are millions of reasons to join Talkmobile, so many that we would be here for hours if we were to cover them all. For that reason, we’ve picked a few of our favourite reasons you should join Talkmobile. Starting off with their amazing prices, you’re going to save huge amounts of money. When you sign up to a new mobile phone deal, you don’t expect to save money. That’s what makes these deals so valuable. Enjoy modern technology at a price cheaper than your weekly food shop! You may even come across a high value cashback deal too!

Network coverage is possibly one of the most important things when it comes to a mobile phone contract. Without great coverage, you’re paying for something you can’t even use. As Talkmobile uses Vodafone’s network, you don’t have to worry about bad coverage. You will be able to enjoy coveragea cross 99.7% of the UKs population so you can stay connected. That means you’ll have access to the internet almost anywhere.

Keeping things easy and simple is something Talkmobile pride themselves off. One of the best ways of keeping things simple is to make sure costs don’t exceed what they’re said to be. Of course, this doesn’t mean that your monthly cost will stay that price if you exceed your allowance. What we mean by this is you’ll be able to add spend caps with no issue. Spend caps will allow you to block your monthly cost at the price it already is so you don’t come across any nasty costs.

 

Now that you can answer the question, ‘What is Talkmobile?’, we’re sure you’re going to be even more intrigued. Make sure you check out our best Talkmobile deals if you want something that’s extremely high quality whilst keeping the costs low. With deals across all your favourite smartphones, we’re sure they’ve got something for you.
